name: @zimbra/x-ui
description: LESS mixins, CSS variables, and icons used by the Zimbra X client and Zimbra X compatible zimlets

scripts.build: npm run generateCSSVariablesFile && npm run generateIconVariablesFile
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
